trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_SEQ_00<tab>Judging by the hunter's jovial expression, the hunt is still on.
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the hearty hunter.
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_001<tab>The great hunter returns. You did well taking on that Rathalos.
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_002<tab>Though I must ask: was the battle grueling? Did the mountains sing with the sound of claws clashing with steel?
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_A1_000_001<tab>I've had tougher battles.
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_A1_000_002<tab>It was admittedly more trouble than I expected.
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_RIVALMOBHUNTER_100_002<tab>Ah, but of course. Perhaps battle with a high-ranking Rathalos would have put a bit of sweat on your brow.
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_RIVALMOBHUNTER_101_002<tab>Truly? I shudder to think what would have happened had you encountered a high-ranking Rathalos, then.
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_003<tab>Piqued your curiosity, have I? Well, I can only tell you what I've heard.
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_004<tab>They say there is a stronger brood of Rathalos that would make short work of your average hunter.
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_005<tab>Mayhap that kitten friend of yours knows something of it. He was, after all, the one who originally posted a bill for the beast.

TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_006<tab>No need to worry over it now, though. I'd say you've earned a rest after your recent exertions in the Azim Steppe. When you're up for another hunt I'll be here, ready and waiting.
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_010<tab>The mighty hunter returns, and with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> feline companion!
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_FELYNE_000_011<tab>Feline!? How rude! I am a <var 1A 02 /var>Felyne<var 1A 01 /var> you dullard!

TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_012<tab>I...fail to see the difference... Ahem. But that is neither here nor there. I asked <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> to bring you here that we might learn the truth of these high-ranking Rathalos I recently caught wind of.
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_FELYNE_000_013<tab>High Rank Rathalos? They're an older, much more powerful brood of wyvern...
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_FELYNE_000_014<tab>Without sufficient protection, even the simplest of swipes is all it would take to rend a hunter in two.
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_015<tab>If I didn't know better, I'd say you were talking about an elite mark. Yes, a challenge no self-respecting hunter can ignore!
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_RIVALMOBHUNTER_000_016<tab>It's settled, then. Are you ready, my friend?
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_SMITHERY_000_017<tab>Aye! Let's get to it!
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_FELYNE_000_018<tab>Your enthusiasm is appreciated, but now isn't the time to be kitten around. To be purrrfectly plain, I'd rather not see another hunter charbroiled today.
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_SYSTEM_000_019<tab>You have unlocked the Great Hunt (Extreme). Test your mettle against High Rank Rathalos and reap rich rewards!
TEXT_STMBDY992_01555_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Please note you may only enter the Great Hunt (Extreme) with four players.
